tool_description: Retrieves a random informational article from [Industrypedia](https://industrypedia.net).
name: Industrypedia Random Articles
title: Industrypedia Random Articles

api_list.name: Retrieve Random Article
api_list.description: Retrieves a random informational article from [Industrypedia](https://industrypedia.net).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://industrypedia-random-articles.p.rapidapi.com/industrypedia.net/?redirect_to=random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "industrypedia-random-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://industrypedia-random-articles.p.rapidapi.com/industrypedia.net/?redirect_to=random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "industrypedia-random-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
